hero.description: Passionate about creating innovative solutions and delivering exceptional user experiences through clean, efficient code and modern technologies.

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: As a Full Stack Developer, I combine technical expertise with creative problem-solving to build modern, efficient web applications. My journey in software development has equipped me with a deep understanding of both front-end and back-end technologies.
about.paragraph2: I'm passionate about creating clean, maintainable code and implementing best practices in software development. My approach focuses on delivering solutions that not only meet technical requirements but also provide exceptional user experiences.
about.paragraph3: Whether working independently or as part of a team, I bring dedication, creativity, and innovative thinking to every project. I'm constantly learning and adapting to new technologies to stay at the forefront of web development.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Here are some of my recent projects. From developing innovative e-commerce solutions to advanced web scraping tools, these projects reflect my passion for modern web technologies and efficient software solutions. Each project presents its own technical challenges and learning opportunities.

ecommerce.title: E-Commerce Platform
ecommerce.description: A full-stack e-commerce solution with shopping cart and payment integration

taskmanager.title: Task Management App
taskmanager.description: Mobile task manager with real-time updates and team collaboration features

portfolio.title: Portfolio Website
portfolio.description: Modern portfolio website built with Next.js and Material-UI

fritz.title: Fritz - December 2024
fritz.description: My most precious project - the birth of my son Fritz. A new chapter in life, filled with love, joy, and endless possibilities.

marktzone.title: MarktZone.io
marktzone.description: Innovative e-commerce platform with cutting-edge tech stack for seamless online shopping and selling experience.

checkdiepreise.title: check-die-preise.de
checkdiepreise.description: Online price comparison platform built with modern web technologies and data scraping capabilities.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: I look forward to hearing from you. Simply fill out the form, and I will get back to you as soon as possible.

form.header: Contact Form - Ping me like a Pro
form.instructions: Please follow the steps below to send me a message:

steps.1: Enter your email and press Enter
steps.2: Type your message and press Enter

form.notice: NOTICE: The keyword "tokyo" is restricted to civilian access. Standard contact form users should ignore this warning and should not type "tokyo" in the email field and press enter.

email.label: Email
email.invalid: Please enter a valid email address

contact.success: Thank you for your message! I will get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.error: Sorry, there was an error sending your message. Please try again later.

cv.title: Education & Certificates
cv.description: My educational journey reflects my passion for technology and continuous learning. Starting with a strong foundation in mathematics and physics, I've expanded into computer science and modern web technologies. Through formal education and professional certifications, I've built a diverse skill set that combines theoretical knowledge with practical expertise in cloud computing and web development.

bta.title: Biological Technical Assistant
bta.description: Training as a Biological Technical Assistant. Acquisition of solid analytical skills and scientific foundations that have proven valuable for the systematic approach to complex technical problems.

bachelor.title: Bachelor of Science
bachelor.description: Bachelor of Science with focus on analytical thinking and problem-solving. Combination of theoretical knowledge with practical applications in scientific computing.

master.title: Master of Science
master.description: Master of Science with specialization in data analysis and computer-aided methods. In-depth expertise in statistical analysis and data-driven decision making.

frontend.title: Frontend Development
frontend.description: Intensive further education in modern frontend development technologies during a gap year. Focus on responsive design, modern JavaScript frameworks, and web development best practices.

fullstack.title: Software Developer
fullstack.description: Fullstack development of modern applications with .NET Core, Entity Framework, Python, and automated testing (Selenium/UIPath). Daily work with Git for version control and close collaboration in agile teams. Key projects include a modular enterprise management app (Blazor, ASP.NET Core, PostgreSQL) and a laboratory middleware system (Spring Boot, Java, Docker).

instructor.title: Programming Instructor
instructor.description: Programming instructor for Python (basics, Data Science), Dart & Flutter, and HTML5/CSS3 (including SASS). Independent organization and implementation of 4-week modules for groups of approximately 15 participants in full-time online courses.

aws.title: AWS Cloud Practitioner
aws.description: AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner certification, demonstrating fundamental knowledge of AWS cloud architecture, services, and operations.

react.title: React Advanced
react.description: Advanced React certification focusing on complex state management, performance optimization, custom hooks, and modern React patterns.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.content: This website uses cookies to enhance your browsing experience. We do not collect any personal data without your explicit consent. For more information about how we handle your data, please contact us through the provided contact form.
